altformavail.head: Alternative Form
altformavail.p: The library has three published versions of the report entered under: Hartwell, Henry. Present state of Virginia and the College.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Henry Hartwell was a member of the Council of Virginia. James Blair was president of the College of William and Mary. Edward Chilton, served as attorney general of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This report, sent to the Board of Trade by Henry Hartwell, James Blair and Edward Chilton, discusses contemporary social, political, economic, and religious conditions in Virginia.
